publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4507.1 Rosie Kane: Climate Change—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4507) in the name of Ross Finnie, leave out from first "welcomes" to end and insert "notes the publication of Changing Our Ways: Scotland’s Climate Change Programme as a positive step towards addressing climate change; notes and welcomes the identification of the Scottish Share of carbon savings and the setting of a Scottish Target; recognises that it is the poor of the world who disproportionately bear the brunt of climate change events while it is the rich who disproportionately are the cause of climate change; recognises that governments must protect their poorer communities from the impacts of climate change while addressing the neo-liberal economic policies that cause climate change, and calls on the Scottish Executive to protect the homes of vulnerable communities in Scotland, to reverse its policies on road building and invest in a properly integrated public transport system, to invest in a publicly owned railway system including freight rail, to invest in renewable energy development that encompasses all types of renewable energy, unequivocally to ditch the notion of nuclear energy, to introduce energy efficiency measures in industry and business, to introduce energy efficiency measures in house building to address fuel poverty, to stop house building in flood plain areas, properly to invest in river management, to stop the building of luxury golf courses for the rich which are detrimental to the environment, to invest in organic farming to reduce the reliance on chemicals from the petrochemical industry, to invest in locally grown food in order to reduce the number of miles our food travels and the amount of packaging waste produced and properly to invest in reduced reuse and recycle facilities rather than landfill."
